translations: v.发音；（庄严地）宣布（pronounce 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I think reading is more than pronouncing or thinking about words.
sentences.translation: 我认为阅读不仅仅是发音或思考单词。

sentences.sentence: I've always hated making mistakes or pronouncing a word incorrectly when I speak English, but Miss Li just smiles, so that I don't feel that stupid!
sentences.translation: 当我说英语的时候，我总是讨厌出错或者发音出错，但是李老师只是微笑，所以我不觉得自己很笨！

sentences.sentence: It is a wise choice not go pronouncing on a subject that you know so little about.
sentences.translation: 对你所知甚少的问题不发表意见是明智的选择。
